comments.raw_text: The vismet tasks for live sites are not running at the moment and it seems to be because the cron tasks are throwing them out.
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com

comments.text: The vismet tasks for live sites are not running at the moment and it seems to be because the cron tasks are throwing them out.

Created attachment 9144726
Bug 1634184 - Pick up visual metrics tasks in the cron task. r?#perftest


The visual metrics tasks were not being picked up by the cron task. This patch fixes this by correctly parsing for vismet tasks in the general_perf_testing cron task.
